      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addDisallowedRunningApp(android.content.ComponentName admin, java.util.List<java.lang.String> packageNames)
      add package name(s) to disallowed running app list by the current admin.After setting this, this user can not launch the app when its' package name in this list.
      boolean addIgnoreFrequentRelaunchAppList(android.content.ComponentName admin, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> apps)
      Add launcher app packages to the list in which apps frequently restart will not cause a prompt hint by the current admin.
      boolean addInstallPackageBlackList(android.content.ComponentName admin, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> packageNames)
      Add package name to the black list which apps can't be installed by the current admin.
      void addPersistentApp(android.content.ComponentName admin, java.util.List<java.lang.String> packageNames)
      add package name(s) to persistent app list by the current admin.After setting this, this user can not kill app process when its' package name in this list once launched, and this function will not take effection on the system app.
      boolean addSingleApp(android.content.ComponentName admin, java.lang.String packageName)
      Set a application as the single application by it's name.
      boolean clearSingleApp(android.content.ComponentName admin, java.lang.String packageName)
      Remove the single application by it's name, the single application will not running singly.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDisallowedRunningApp(android.content.ComponentName admin)
      get disallowed running app list for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getIgnoreFrequentRelaunchAppList(android.content.ComponentName admin)
      Get the app packages in the list in which apps frequently restart will not cause a prompt hint for this user, either by the current admin.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getInstallPackageBlackList(android.content.ComponentName admin)
      Get the app package name black list in which apps can't be installed for this user, either by the current admin.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPersistentApp(android.content.ComponentName admin)
      get persistent app list for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
      java.lang.String getSingleApp(android.content.ComponentName admin)
      Get the application package name of current single application.
      void killApplicationProcess(android.content.ComponentName admin, java.lang.String packageName)
      kill app process except itself by the current admin.
      void removeDisallowedRunningApp(android.content.ComponentName admin, java.util.List<java.lang.String> packageNames)
      remove package name(s) from disallowed running app list by the current admin.
      boolean removeIgnoreFrequentRelaunchAppList(android.content.ComponentName admin, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> apps)
      Remove launcher app packages in the list in which apps frequently restart will not cause a prompt hint by the current admin.
      boolean removeInstallPackageBlackList(android.content.ComponentName admin, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> packageNames)
      Remove package name of the black list which apps can't be installed by the current admin.
      void removePersistentApp(android.content.ComponentName admin, java.util.List<java.lang.String> packageNames)
      remove package name(s) from persistent app list by the current admin.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • DeviceApplicationManager

        public DeviceApplicationManager()

    • 方法详细资料

      • addPersistentApp

        public void addPersistentApp(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> packageNames)
        add package name(s) to persistent app list by the current admin.After setting this, this user can not kill app process when its' package name in this list once launched, and this function will not take effection on the system app.
        参数:
        admin - the admin of the list.
        packageNames - app list to be added.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • removePersistentApp

        public void removePersistentApp(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                java.util.List<java.lang.String> packageNames)
        remove package name(s) from persistent app list by the current admin.
        参数:
        admin - the admin of the list.
        packageNames - app list to be removed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • getPersistentApp

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPersistentApp(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        get persistent app list for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component to check, or null to get all persistent app lists of all admins.
        返回:
        package name(s) of persistent app list.

      • addDisallowedRunningApp

        public void addDisallowedRunningApp(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> packageNames)
        add package name(s) to disallowed running app list by the current admin.After setting this, this user can not launch the app when its' package name in this list. and this function will not take effection on the system app.
        参数:
        admin - the admin of the list.
        packageNames - app package name list to be added.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • removeDisallowedRunningApp

        public void removeDisallowedRunningApp(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> packageNames)
        remove package name(s) from disallowed running app list by the current admin.
        参数:
        admin - the admin of the list.
        packageNames - app package name list to be removed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • getDisallowedRunningApp

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDisallowedRunningApp(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        get disallowed running app list for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component to check, or null to get all disallowed running app lists of all admins.
        返回:
        package name(s) of disallowed running app list.

      • killApplicationProcess

        public void killApplicationProcess(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                   java.lang.String packageName)
        kill app process except itself by the current admin. and this function will not take effection on the system app.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        packageName - the package name of the app to be killed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • addInstallPackageBlackList

        public boolean addInstallPackageBlackList(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> packageNames)
        Add package name to the black list which apps can't be installed by the current admin.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        packageNames - A list of package name of apps to be added to the list.
        返回:
        true if the policy has been set successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • getInstallPackageBlackList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getInstallPackageBlackList(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Get the app package name black list in which apps can't be installed for this user, either by the current admin.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        返回:
        the app package list or null if no package list has been set.

      • removeInstallPackageBlackList

        public boolean removeInstallPackageBlackList(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> packageNames)
        Remove package name of the black list which apps can't be installed by the current admin.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        packageNames - A list of package name of apps to be added to the list.
        返回:
        true if the policy has been set successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • addIgnoreFrequentRelaunchAppList

        public boolean addIgnoreFrequentRelaunchAppList(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> apps)
        Add launcher app packages to the list in which apps frequently restart will not cause a prompt hint by the current admin. Note that this will not cover the case the app is abnormally crashed frequently.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        apps - A set of package names of launcher apps to be added to the list.
        返回:
        true if the policy has been set successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • removeIgnoreFrequentRelaunchAppList

        public boolean removeIgnoreFrequentRelaunchAppList(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> apps)
        Remove launcher app packages in the list in which apps frequently restart will not cause a prompt hint by the current admin.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        apps - A set of package names of launcher apps to be removed to the list.
        返回:
        true if the policy has been set successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • getIgnoreFrequentRelaunchAppList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getIgnoreFrequentRelaunchAppList(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Get the app packages in the list in which apps frequently restart will not cause a prompt hint for this user, either by the current admin.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        返回:
        the app package list or null if no package list has been set.

      • addSingleApp

        public boolean addSingleApp(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                            java.lang.String packageName)
        Set a application as the single application by it's name. If there was another single application, the old one will be replaced. Open the single application. This MDM interface will depend on other MDM interface, such as disallow menu button, disallow setting, disallow multi-users and so on, to make single application running singly.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        packageName - The package name of single apllication to be set.
        返回:
        true if the policy has been set successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • clearSingleApp

        public boolean clearSingleApp(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                              java.lang.String packageName)
        Remove the single application by it's name, the single application will not running singly. If success or the name is not single application, return ture.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        packageName - The package name of single apllication to be set.
        返回:
        true if the policy has been set successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • getSingleApp

        public java.lang.String getSingleApp(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Get the application package name of current single application.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        返回:
        the application package name of single application.
